name: Rachel
ans: Always comment your code to make it reuseable.

name: Ross
ans: Consider time and space complexities. Programming is more about thinking than writing. Make sure that you understand the problem at hand, the inputs/outputs that are needed and the partitioning of your modules.

name: Chandler
ans: Use short and descriptive variable names. Use correct indentation.

name: Monica
ans: Use version control system such as GIT.

name: Joe
ans: Testing is mandatory after every change no matter how tight schedule you have.
